drink_items.name: Espresso
drink_items.description: A concentrated coffee brewed by forcing hot water under high pressure through finely ground coffee beans.

drink_items.name: Cappuccino
drink_items.description: An espresso-based drink made with steamed milk and a thick layer of milk foam on top.

drink_items.name: Latte
drink_items.description: A coffee-based drink made with steamed milk and a small amount of foam on top.

drink_items.name: Mocha
drink_items.description: A chocolate-flavored variant of a latte, typically made with espresso and hot milk, and topped with whipped cream.

drink_items.name: Iced Tea
drink_items.description: A refreshing cold drink made by steeping tea leaves in cold water and served over ice.
